title: Blueberries on toast
directions: Mix everything together and heat all until it is boiling.
Thicken with cornstarch (2 tablespoons cornstarch and 2 tablespoons water). Poor slowly and mix into boiling mixture.
Cook on low oil for 1 minute while stirring.
Blueberries vary a lot in sweetness so adjust sugar as needed.
If sauce is too thin add more cornstarch mixture.
ingredients: 1/2 cup sugar or add more or less to preferred taste
To thicken add 2 tablespoons cornstarch and 2 tablespoons water
